wikipedia_page.main: Cyril Walter Horn (7 October 1904 – 7 February 1987) was an English speed skater and cyclist. He competed in the 500–5000 m events at the 1924 and 1928 Winter Olympics with the best result of 23rd place in the 5000 m in 1928.

response: * October 7 – Cyril Horn, English speed skater (died 1987)
